# Teste 01 - teste t (28/3/2022)

exemplo de aula
```{r}
set.seed((13))
x <- rnorm(10,3,2)

ttest <- t.test(x, mu=3, paired=F)
ttest

#definindo alpha
alpha <- 0.05
alpha/2

#quantis da distribuicao
n <- length(x)
c(qt(alpha/2, n-1))
```
```{r}
n = 148
mu= 125
m_amostral = 137.3
var_amostral = 37.14

x <- rnorm(148,137.3, 37.14)
ttest <- t.test(x, mu=137.3)
ttest
```
